item.name: KeyPointTimeTolerance
item.comments: 判断关键点时间容差(单位:S)

item.name: SyncTime
item.comments: 定时同步时间间隔(单位:S)

item.name: expiredSeconds
item.comments: redis告警缓存失效时间(单位:S)

item.name: AnalyserAddIns
item.comments: 软报警插件解析业务类，软报警启动0、2、7、8、9、10； GPS巡检启动4、5、6
围栏区域分析报警业务类
线路(偏移,分段限速)分析报警业务类
非法运营软报警业务类
报警自动下发消息提示业务类（终端上报告警）
疲劳驾驶软报警业务类
车辆进出站分析业务类

item.name: ManageFlag
item.comments: 消息服务配置管理测试开关 1启动消息服务直连，0通过节点管理处理

item.name: DBReconnectWait
item.comments: 数据库断线重连延时(秒)

item.name: abandonedConnectionTimeout
item.comments: Sets the maximum time that a connection can remain unused before the connection is closed and returned to the cache(单位:S)

item.name: propertyCheckInterval
item.comments: Sets the time interval at which the cache manager inspects and enforces all specified cache properties (单位:S)

item.name: inactivityTimeout
item.comments: Sets the maximum time a physical connection can remain idle in a connection cache.(单位:S)

item.name: redisMaxWait
item.comments: 连接REDIS 超时时间(单位：秒)

item.name: redisMaxIdle
item.comments: 最大能够保持空闲状态的对象数

item.name: sql_queryAlarmVehicle
item.value: SELECT V.VEHICLE_NO, V.VID AS VID, M.COMMADDR AS COMMADDR, VINFO.PENT_ID, VINFO.PENT_NAME, VINFO.ENT_ID, VINFO.ENT_NAME, VINFO.INNER_CODE, VINFO.VIN_CODE, V.PLATE_COLOR FROM TB_SIM M, TR_SERVICEUNIT S, TB_VEHICLE V, (SELECT ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION WHERE ENT_TYPE != 4 START WITH ENT_ID = '1' CONNECT BY PRIOR ENT_ID = PARENT_ID) ORG, VIEW_VEHICLE_INFO VINFO WHERE V.ENABLE_FLAG = 1 AND V.VEHICLE_STATE != 3 AND V.ENT_ID = ORG.ENT_ID AND V.VID = S.VID AND S.SID = M.SID AND VINFO.VID = V.VID
item.comments: 初始化加载所有车辆基本信息

item.name: sql_queryAreaAlarm
item.value: SELECT TRB.VID, A.REGION_ID AREAID, A.AREA_NAME AREANAME, TRA.LONLAT_STR LONLAT, TR.AREA_MAXSPEED*10 AREAMAXSPEED, TR.SUPERSPEED_TIMES SUPERSPEEDTIMES, TR.AREA_USETYPE USETYPE, TR.AREA_BEGINTIME*1000 AREABEGINTIME, TR.AREA_ENDTIME*1000 AREAENDTIME, A.AREA_SHAPE AREASHAPE, TR.MESSAGE_VALUE, TR.VEHICLE_DOOR_TYPE, TR.AREA_LOWSPEED*10 AREALOWSPEED, TR.LOWSPEED_TIMES LOWSPEEDTIMES FROM TR_VEHICLE_AREA TR JOIN TR_BIND_AREA TRB ON TRB.AREA_ID = TR.AREA_ID JOIN TB_AREA A ON A.AREA_ID = TR.AREA_ID JOIN TR_AREA TRA ON TRA.AREA_ID = TR.AREA_ID WHERE TR.AREA_DECIDE = 1 AND TR.AREA_ENABLE = 1 AND TRB.SEND_STATUS = 0 AND TRB.AREA_STATUS != 3 AND A.AREA_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY TR.VID
item.comments: 查询区域报警车辆信息 AND FUN_DATE2UTC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN TR.AREA_BEGINTIME AND TR.AREA_ENDTIME

item.name: sql_queryLineAlarm
item.value: SELECT TL.PID, TL.LINE_ID LINEID, TCL.LINE_NAME LINENAME, TL.ROAD_WIGHT ROADWIGHT, TL.SPEED_THRESHOLD SPEEDTHRESHOLD, TL.SPEED_TIME_THRESHOLD SPEEDTIMETHRESHOLD, TLV.VID, TLV.USETYPE USETYPE, TLV.PERIOD_BEGINTIME PERIODBEGINTIME, TLV.PERIOD_ENDTIME PERIODENDTIME, TLV.LINE_BEGINTIME STARTTIME, TLV.LINE_ENDTIME ENDTIME, TL.START_STATION_ID, TL.END_STATION_ID FROM TB_LINE_PROP TL JOIN TR_LINE_VEHICLE TLV ON TL.LINE_ID = TLV.CLASS_LINE_ID JOIN TB_CLASS_LINE TCL ON TLV.CLASS_LINE_ID = TCL.LINE_ID AND FUN_DATE2UTC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN TLV.LINE_BEGINTIME AND TLV.LINE_ENDTIME AND TLV.LINE_STATUS IN (1, 2) AND TCL.JUDGMENT = 1 AND TCL.ENABLE_FLAG = 1
item.comments: 查询线路报警车辆信息

item.name: sql_queryLineAlarmNode
item.value: SELECT F_LINK_LOB(MAPLON || ',' || MAPLAT) LONLAT FROM TB_STATION WHERE LINE_ID = ? AND STATION_NO BETWEEN ? AND ? AND ENABLE_FLAG = 1 GROUP BY LINE_ID
item.comments: 查询设置过告警参数的线路节点

item.name: sql_queryRoadAlarm
item.value: select tvs.vid, tss.config_id, tss.config_name, tss.ent_id, tss.create_by, tss.create_time, tss.update_by, tss.update_time, tss.enable_flag, tss.is_default, tss.ew_speed_limit, tss.ew_continue_limit, tss.nr_speed_limit, tss.nr_continue_limit, tss.pr_speed_limit, tss.pr_continue_limit, tss.cr_speed_limit, tss.cr_continue_limit, tss.or_speed_limit, tss.or_continue_limit from TR_VEHICLE_SECTIONCFG tvs join TB_SECTION_SPEEDLIMIT tss on tvs.config_id = tss.config_id and tss.enable_flag = '1'
item.comments: 查询所有绑定的道路等級配置信息

item.name: sql_updateVehicleAlarm
item.value: UPDATE TH_VEHICLE_ALARM SET ALARM_END_UTC = ?,END_LAT=?,END_LON=?,END_MAPLAT=?,END_MAPLON=?,END_ELEVATION=?,END_DIRECTION=?,END_GPS_SPEED=?,END_MILEAGE=?,END_OIL_TOTAL=?, ALARM_STATUS=0,ALARM_ADD_INFO_END =?,MAX_SPEED=?,AVG_SPEED=? WHERE ALARM_ID = ?

item.name: sql_saveVehicleAlarmEventInfo
item.comments: 存储报警事件统计信息

item.name: sql_gpsInsVehicle
item.value: SELECT V.VEHICLE_NO, V.VID AS VID, M.COMMADDR AS COMMADDR FROM TB_SIM M, TR_SERVICEUNIT S, TB_VEHICLE V, (SELECT ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION START WITH ENT_ID = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR ENT_ID = PARENT_ID) ORG WHERE V.ENABLE_FLAG = 1 AND V.ENT_ID = ORG.ENT_ID AND V.VID = S.VID AND S.SID = M.SID

item.name: sql_queryNewVehicle
item.value: SELECT V.VID VID, SIM.COMMADDR COMMADDR, V.VEHICLE_NO VEHICLENO, VINFO.PENT_ID, VINFO.PENT_NAME, VINFO.ENT_ID, VINFO.ENT_NAME, V.INNER_CODE, V.VIN_CODE, V.PLATE_COLOR FROM TB_VEHICLE V, TR_SERVICEUNIT TS, TB_SIM SIM,VIEW_VEHICLE_INFO VINFO WHERE V.ENABLE_FLAG = 1 AND V.VEHICLE_STATE != 3 AND (V.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR V.CREATE_TIME > = ? OR SIM.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR SIM.CREATE_TIME >= ? OR TS.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR TS.CREATE_TIME >= ?) AND V.VID = TS.VID AND SIM.SID = TS.SID AND V.VID=VINFO.VID
item.comments: 加载增量车辆基本信息

item.name: sql_queryDelVehicle
item.value: SELECT SIM.COMMADDR FROM TB_SIM SIM WHERE SIM.ENABLE_FLAG = 0 AND SIM.UPDATE_TIME >= ? UNION SELECT SIM.COMMADDR FROM TB_VEHICLE V, TR_SERVICEUNIT TS, TB_SIM SIM WHERE V.VEHICLE_STATE = 3 AND V.UPDATE_TIME >= ? AND V.VID = TS.VID AND SIM.SID = TS.SID
item.comments: 加载已删除车辆基本信息

item.name: sql_queryOrgAlarmConf
item.comments: 加载企业告警等级配置信息

item.name: sql_queryAlarmNotice
item.value: SELECT A.ENT_ID, ALARM_CLASS, ALARM_CODE, DISPLAY_FLAG, TTS_FLAG, MSG FROM (SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG.ENT_ID CFG_ENT_ID, ORG.ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION ORG LEFT JOIN (SELECT ENT_ID FROM tb_alarm_notice WHERE enable_flag = '1') TIO ON ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID START WITH ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG.ENT_ID = ORG.PARENT_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tb_alarm_notice WHERE ENT_ID = ORG.ENT_ID)) A, tb_alarm_notice B WHERE A.CFG_ENT_ID = B.ENT_ID
item.comments: 查询企业车辆告警下发消息内容

item.name: vehicleAlarmUpdateSql
item.value: SELECT V.VID VID, SIM.COMMADDR COMMADDR, V.VEHICLE_NO VEHICLENO, VINFO.PENT_ID, VINFO.PENT_NAME, VINFO.ENT_ID, VINFO.ENT_NAME, V.INNER_CODE, V.VIN_CODE, V.PLATE_COLOR FROM TB_VEHICLE V, TR_SERVICEUNIT TS, TB_SIM SIM, VIEW_VEHICLE_INFO VINFO,TB_TERMINAL TT WHERE V.VID = VINFO.VID AND V.VID = TS.VID AND SIM.SID = TS.SID AND TS.TID=TT.TID AND V.ENABLE_FLAG = 1 AND V.VEHICLE_STATE != 3

item.name: vehicleAlarmBlukAddSql
item.value: SELECT V.VEHICLE_NO, V.VID AS VID, M.COMMADDR AS COMMADDR, VINFO.PENT_ID, VINFO.PENT_NAME, VINFO.ENT_ID, VINFO.ENT_NAME, VINFO.INNER_CODE, VINFO.VIN_CODE, V.PLATE_COLOR FROM TB_SIM M, TR_SERVICEUNIT S, TB_VEHICLE V, (SELECT ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION WHERE ENT_TYPE != 4 START WITH ENT_ID = '1' CONNECT BY PRIOR ENT_ID = PARENT_ID) ORG, VIEW_VEHICLE_INFO VINFO WHERE V.ENABLE_FLAG = 1 AND V.VEHICLE_STATE != 3 AND V.ENT_ID = ORG.ENT_ID AND V.VID = S.VID AND S.SID = M.SID AND VINFO.VID = V.VID

item.name: roadAlarmUpdateSql
item.comments: 查询所有绑定的道路等級配置信息
item.value: select tvs.vid, tss.config_id, tss.config_name, tss.ent_id, tss.create_by, tss.create_time, tss.update_by, tss.update_time, tss.enable_flag, tss.is_default, tss.ew_speed_limit, tss.ew_continue_limit, tss.nr_speed_limit, tss.nr_continue_limit, tss.pr_speed_limit, tss.pr_continue_limit, tss.cr_speed_limit, tss.cr_continue_limit, tss.or_speed_limit, tss.or_continue_limit from TR_VEHICLE_SECTIONCFG tvs join TB_SECTION_SPEEDLIMIT tss on tvs.config_id = tss.config_id and tss.enable_flag = '1'

item.name: areaAlarmQuerySQL
item.value: SELECT TRB.VID, A.REGION_ID AREAID, A.AREA_NAME AREANAME, TRA.LONLAT_STR LONLAT, TR.AREA_MAXSPEED*10 AREAMAXSPEED, TR.SUPERSPEED_TIMES SUPERSPEEDTIMES, TR.AREA_USETYPE USETYPE, TR.AREA_BEGINTIME*1000 AREABEGINTIME, TR.AREA_ENDTIME*1000 AREAENDTIME, A.AREA_SHAPE AREASHAPE, TR.MESSAGE_VALUE, TR.VEHICLE_DOOR_TYPE, TR.AREA_LOWSPEED*10 AREALOWSPEED, TR.LOWSPEED_TIMES LOWSPEEDTIMES FROM TR_VEHICLE_AREA TR JOIN TR_BIND_AREA TRB ON TRB.AREA_ID = TR.AREA_ID JOIN TB_AREA A ON A.AREA_ID = TR.AREA_ID JOIN TR_AREA TRA ON TRA.AREA_ID = TR.AREA_ID WHERE TR.AREA_DECIDE = 1 AND TR.AREA_ENABLE = 1 AND TRB.SEND_STATUS = 0 AND TRB.AREA_STATUS != 3 AND A.AREA_STATUS = 1

item.name: lineAlarmQuerySQL
item.comments: 查询线路报警车辆信息
item.value: select tl.pid, ts.line_id LineId, tcl.line_name linename, tl.road_wight roadWight, ts.maplon || ',' || ts.maplat lonlat, tl.speed_threshold speedThreshold, tl.speed_time_threshold speedTimeThreshold, tlv.vid, tlv.usetype usetype, tlv.PERIOD_BEGINTIME periodbegintime, tlv.PERIOD_ENDTIME periodendtime, tlv.line_begintime startTime, tlv.line_endtime endTime from kcpt.tb_line_prop tl join kcpt.tb_station ts on tl.line_id = ts.line_id join kcpt.tr_line_vehicle tlv on ts.line_id = tlv.class_line_id join kcpt.tb_class_line tcl on tlv.class_line_id = tcl.line_id where 1 = 1 and tcl.judgment = 1 and tcl.enable_flag = 1 and tlv.line_status in (1, 2) and ts.lon > 0 and ts.station_no between tl.start_station_id and tl.end_station_id and FUN_DATE2UTC(sysdate) between tlv.line_begintime and tlv.line_endtime group by tl.pid, ts.line_id, tcl.line_name, tl.road_wight, tl.speed_threshold, tl.speed_time_threshold, tlv.vid, tlv.usetype, tlv.PERIOD_BEGINTIME, tlv.PERIOD_ENDTIME, tlv.line_begintime, tlv.line_endtime, ts.maplon, ts.maplat

item.name: illeOptQuerySQL
item.comments: 查询线路报警车辆信息
item.value: SELECT VID, V.ENT_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFERRED, ISDEFAULT FROM TB_VEHICLE V JOIN (SELECT A.ENT_ID, B.TB_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFERRED, B.ISDEFAULT FROM (SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG.ENT_ID CFG_ENT_ID, ORG.ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION ORG LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ENT_ID FROM TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET WHERE ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND ALARM_TYPE = '3') TIO ON ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID START WITH ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG.ENT_ID = ORG.PARENT_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET WHERE ENT_ID = ORG.ENT_ID AND ALARM_TYPE = '3')) A, TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET B WHERE A.CFG_ENT_ID = B.ENT_ID AND ALARM_TYPE = '3') CFG ON V.ENT_ID = CFG.ENT_ID ORDER BY VID, V.ENT_ID, START_TIME

item.name: sql_queryOverspeedAlarmCfg
item.value: SELECT VID, V.ENT_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME,SPEED_SCALE FROM TB_VEHICLE V JOIN (SELECT A.ENT_ID, B.TB_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFERRED, B.ISDEFAULT, B.SPEED_SCALE FROM (SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG.ENT_ID CFG_ENT_ID, ORG.ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION ORG LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ENT_ID FROM TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET WHERE ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND ALARM_TYPE = '1') TIO ON ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID START WITH ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG.ENT_ID = ORG.PARENT_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET WHERE ENT_ID = ORG.ENT_ID AND ALARM_TYPE = '1')) A, TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET B WHERE A.CFG_ENT_ID = B.ENT_ID AND ALARM_TYPE = '1') CFG ON V.ENT_ID = CFG.ENT_ID ORDER BY VID, V.ENT_ID, START_TIME
item.comments: 查询企业车辆超速告警设置

item.name: sql_queryFatigueAlarmCfg
item.value: SELECT VID, V.ENT_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFERRED, ISDEFAULT FROM TB_VEHICLE V JOIN (SELECT A.ENT_ID, B.TB_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFERRED, B.ISDEFAULT FROM (SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG.ENT_ID CFG_ENT_ID, ORG.ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION ORG LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ENT_ID FROM TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET WHERE ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND ALARM_TYPE = '2') TIO ON ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID START WITH ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG.ENT_ID = ORG.PARENT_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET WHERE ENT_ID = ORG.ENT_ID AND ALARM_TYPE = '2')) A, TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET B WHERE A.CFG_ENT_ID = B.ENT_ID AND ALARM_TYPE = '2') CFG ON V.ENT_ID = CFG.ENT_ID ORDER BY VID, V.ENT_ID, START_TIME
item.comments: 查询绑定疲劳驾驶告警的车辆信息

item.name: sql_queryIllegealOperationsAlarm
item.value: SELECT VID, V.ENT_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFERRED, ISDEFAULT FROM TB_VEHICLE V JOIN (SELECT A.ENT_ID, B.TB_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFERRED, B.ISDEFAULT FROM (SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG.ENT_ID CFG_ENT_ID, ORG.ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION ORG LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ENT_ID FROM TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET WHERE ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND ALARM_TYPE = '3') TIO ON ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID START WITH ORG.ENT_ID = TIO.ENT_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG.ENT_ID = ORG.PARENT_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET WHERE ENT_ID = ORG.ENT_ID AND ALARM_TYPE = '3')) A, TB_ALARM_TACTICS_SET B WHERE A.CFG_ENT_ID = B.ENT_ID AND ALARM_TYPE = '3') CFG ON V.ENT_ID = CFG.ENT_ID ORDER BY VID, V.ENT_ID, START_TIME
item.comments: 查询绑定夜间非法营运告警的车辆信息

item.name: sql_queryTrVehicleStationInfo
item.comments: 查询车辆站点绑定信息
item.value: SELECT B.VID, C.STATION_ID, C.STATION_CODE, C.STATION_NAME, C.STATION_RADIUS, C.MAPLON, C.MAPLAT, A.LINE_ID, A.STATION_NUMBER, D.STATION_NUM FROM TR_LINE_STATION A, TR_LINE_VEHICLE B, TB_LINE_STATION C, (SELECT LINE_ID, COUNT(1) STATION_NUM FROM TR_LINE_STATION GROUP BY LINE_ID) D WHERE A.LINE_ID = B.CLASS_LINE_ID AND A.STATION_ID = C.STATION_ID AND A.LINE_ID = D.LINE_ID AND C.ENABLE_FLAG = '1'

item.name: sql_orgParentInfo
item.value: SELECT ORG.ENT_ID AS MOTORCADE,PAR.ENT_NAME, ',' || (SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(T.ENT_ID)) FROM KCPT.TB_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND T.ENT_TYPE = 1 START WITH T.ENT_ID = ORG.PARENT_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR T.PARENT_ID = T.ENT_ID) || ',' PARENT_ID FROM KCPT.TB_ORGANIZATION ORG, KCPT.TB_ORGANIZATION PAR WHERE ORG.PARENT_ID=PAR.ENT_ID AND ORG.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND ORG.ENT_TYPE = 2

item.name: t_vehicle_sectioncfg
item.comments: 车辆区间设置变更广播名称

item.name: t_section_speedlimit
item.comments: 车辆区间限速变更广播名称

item.name: t_vehicle_area
item.comments: 车辆区域变更广播名称

item.name: t_bind_area
item.comments: 绑定区域变更广播名称

item.name: t_tr_area
item.comments: 区域关系变更广播名称

item.name: t_line_prop
item.comments: 线路设置变更广播名称

item.name: t_line_vehicle
item.comments: 线路车辆变更广播名称

item.name: t_class_line
item.comments: 线路类型变更广播名称

item.name: t_illegeal_operation_settime
item.comments: 非法运营变更广播名称

item.name: t_alarm_notice
item.comments: 告警提示变更广播名称

item.name: t_terminal_protocol
item.comments: 终端厂商变更广播名称

item.name: t_terminal_oem
item.comments: 终端协议变更广播名称

item.name: t_line_station
item.comments: 线路站点绑定关系变更广播名称
